projects.name: Calculator Webpage
projects.summary: Designed a calculator webpage that offers complete functionality with full keyboard support. Additionally, it includes an undo function and a history tracker to review past calculations. The calculator also incorporates robust user error handling to ensure all possible inputs have a clear response.
highlights: Features: Keyboard inputs, built-in user error handling, and history tracker.

projects.name: Etch-a-Sketch Webpage
projects.summary: Created a web-based version of the classic Etch-a-Sketch where the user can customize the drawing canvas pixel density to increase ease of use or allow for finer details. This webpage is carefully designed to evoke the classic Etch-a-Sketch look while keeping the user's drawing experience mouse based.
highlights: Features: Styled like classic Etch-a-Sketch, user can easily increase or decrease drawing canvas dimensions.

projects.name: Rock Paper Scissors Webpage
projects.summary: Built a browser-based version of Rock, Paper, Scissors with an enhanced user experience by using visual representations of player choices through stock images and incorporating a timed delay to build suspense before revealing the computer's selection.
highlights: Features: Displays images of user selections with delay to keep surprise.

projects.name: Budgeting Tool
projects.summary: Developed a small budgeting tool that tracks income, expenses, and transfers across multiple categories. The tool includes custom visualizations to display budget activity and can generate a bar chart that highlights spending trends.
highlights: Features: Tracks debts and credits to account, displays percentage spent by category as bar chart.
